title: 06/16/21 - HOUR 2 - Kawhi & Paul George, Jim Jackson
itunes:title: 06/16/21 - HOUR 2 - Kawhi & Paul George, Jim Jackson
description:
In hour 2, Colin explains how the Clippers knew what they were in for and got what was expected. Kawhi & Paul George's resumes speak for themselves. Jim Jackson joins to talk Kevin Durant and NBA Playoffs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
